comment: It's sort of funny when you try to make up retarded logic in order to claim someone else's logic is poor. That's the kind of stupidity that will get you far, at least if your homosexuality fails you.
amr:

                  :ARG1 (m2 / make-up-10
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (l / logic
                              :ARG1-of (r / retard-01))
                        :purpose (c / claim-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (p / poor
                                    :domain (l2 / logic
                                          :poss (s / someone
                                                :mod (e / else))))))
                  :degree (s2 / sort-of)))
      :snt2 (s3 / stupidity
            :mod (k / kind
                  :mod (t2 / that))
            :ARG0-of (g / get-05
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG2 (f2 / far)
                  :condition (f3 / fail-01

                              :poss y2)
                        :ARG2 y2
                        :mod (a / at-least)))))
